amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds provided in the bill for the National Institutes of Health from being transferred to the Global Fund and Evaluation Tap.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for activities under section 241(a) of the Public Health Service Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 249 (Roll no. 666).
